column3: Hi there! I'm Cora. I'm here to help you change your dinner habits and maybe find some new recipes for you to cook. So tell me; How are you doing today?
Welcome back! How are you doing today?
Looking good as usual! So did you eventually eat #last_food? I hope you liked it!
Oh. can you tell me why?
I'm here to help you find something healthy to eat. So tell me. Where do you plan to have lunch today?
Are you feeling hungry or would you rather have a light lunch?
One great food option for #situation would be to eat #recipe with #secondaryfood. That's a great option if you #features What do you think?
What about #recipe with #secondaryfood? This meal contains #mainfood which is great if you #features
For #situation I'd recommend eating #recipe, ideal if you #features What do you think?
Enjoy your meal and see you soon!
So before I recommend something let me ask you a few questions. First things first: are you feeling hungry or would you rather have a light dinner?
How healthy do you want your meal to be?
Any specific diet I should be aware of?
We're almost there. Would you have some time to cook tonight or would you rather get something quick to prepare?
One last question. Is there any food you'd like to use? Something already in your kitchen or that you could buy?
